00050 uvm_component::uvm_component(sc_module_name nm) : sc_module(nm) { 
00051 
00052   uvm_common_schedule* pcommon_schedule = get_uvm_common_schedule();
00053   pcommon_schedule->register_callback(this);
00054 
00055   uvm_common_schedule* puvm_schedule = get_uvm_schedule();
00056   puvm_schedule->register_callback(this);
00057 
00058 }

00062 bool uvm_component::has_child(const char* leaf_name) {
00063   string full_name = prepend_name(string(leaf_name));
00064   if (sc_find_object(full_name.c_str())) 
00065     return true;
00066   return false; 
00067 }

00104   uvm_object*& val,
00105   bool clone
00106 ) {
00107   val = NULL; // must initialize it because the template can not assign 0
00108   return uvm_config_db<uvm_object *>::get(this, "", field, val);
00109 }

00199 void uvm_component::run_phase(uvm_phase* phase) { 
00200   phase->barrier.raise_barrier();
00201   run();
00202   phase->barrier.drop_barrier();
00203 }

00310 string uvm_component::prepend_name(string s) {
00311   string n = name();
00312   if (s != "") {
00313     n += string(".");
00314     n += s;
00315   }
00316   return n;
00317 }
00318 
00319 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00320 // Function: get_num_children
00321 //  Returns the number of child components this components has.
00322 //
00323 // Returns:
00324 //  int - number of children the components has.
00325 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00326 int uvm_component::get_num_children() {
00327   std::vector<uvm_component*> child_vec;
00328   child_vec = get_children();
00329 
00330   return child_vec.size();
00331 }
00332 
00333 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00334 // Function: get_children
00335 //  Returns vector of pointers to children
00336 //
00337 // Returns:
00338 //  vec - vector of pointers to children
00339 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00340 std::vector<uvm_component*> uvm_component::get_children() {
00341   std::vector<sc_object*> child_vec;
00342   std::vector<uvm_component*> child_comp_vec;
00343   uvm_component* comp = NULL;
00344   child_vec = get_child_objects();
00345 
00346 
00347   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < child_vec.size(); i++)
00348   {
00349     comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(child_vec[i]);
00350     if (comp != NULL)
00351       child_comp_vec.push_back(comp);
00352   }
00353 
00354   return child_comp_vec;
00355 }
00356 
00357 
00358 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00359 // Function: get_parent
00360 //  Returns a pointer to the parent
00361 //
00362 // Returns:
00363 //  int - number of children the components has.
00364 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00365 uvm_component* uvm_component::get_parent() {
00366   uvm_component*      uvm_comp;
00367   sc_core::sc_object* sc_obj = sc_core::sc_module::get_parent();
00368   
00369   uvm_comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(sc_obj);
00370 
00371   return uvm_comp;
00372 }
